attributes.action: Ease visa rules for the first-degree relatives of British nationals in Ukraine
attributes.additional_details: To protect and support the family members of British nationals amidst Russian aggression and war against Ukraine.
attributes.background: First-degree relatives of British nationals (to incl. spouses and children of the first-degree relative) applying for a Standard Visitor visa must be exempted from application fees and processed in a priority order similarly to those who applied through U.K.’s family migration route.
